settings.label: Custom favicon
settings.info: 16 x 16px .png required

settings.label: Show Top Image?
settings.info: Ideal width : 1440px

settings.label: Top image
settings.info: If you want to set different header image for each collection, pages or article you can do so by inserting an image to the content. The image should have 'top banner' set as alt and 'original' as size as can be seen [here](https://www.masstechnologist.com/tfimages/topbannerimgsettings.png)

settings.label: Color Top BG
settings.info: Used when image disabled. Set to None if you want to hide the header banner area.

settings.label: Header Margin/Spacing on inner pages
settings.info: The space between header and content in inner pages

settings.label: Enable Lazy Loading
settings.info: Lazyloading helps in faster loading of images and overall page performance

settings.label: Image size on product page
settings.info: Size given in pixels

settings.label: Image width on product grid
settings.info: Size given in pixels. Used in conjunction with the next option to calculate the final grid images.

settings.label: Aspect Ratio on product Grid?
settings.info: The ratio of product grid width vs height. Check the image [here](https://www.masstechnologist.com/tfimages/aspect-ratio.png) for better understanding

settings.label: Auto Resize on product Grid?
settings.info: 1:Keeps the images in its original size and aspect ratio. 2:Resize the full images to fit. 3:Crop/Cut images to fit. A portion of mismatched image might be shown but feels better looking.

settings.label: Items/Objects/Grids Roundness
settings.info: Moving towards zero(0) will make it square and moving away will make them round

settings.label: Color Swatch on product Grid?
settings.info: Product page display handled from product page settings area. Incase of thumb, it will show colors if variant images are not added.

settings.label: Limit title length
settings.info: Used to show a part of the title on product grids
